Tyler Streeter wrote:

>>I'm curious why you restart the population rather
>>than just changing the 
>>fitness function in the middle of the run?  Is it
>>that you want to 
>>whittle away all but the best species?  Are the
>>genes in the first run 
>>treated differently in the second run somehow?
>>    
>>
>
>At first I didn't restart the population when
>switching the support off, but the guys that did the
>best with the support died off when it disappeared. 
>I'm still changing a lot of things, though, so this
>might change back.
>
>  
>
I recommend that you do go back. You may indeed see over-fitting to the 
easier/supported task and this can result in a non-champion solution 
performing better than a champion when the support is removed. Also if 
you seed a new population from a champion you will lose population 
diversity, some of which may still be useful. Nice work/website BTW.

Colin.
